info.title: About the Application
info.description: Materalist is a modern platform for creating and sharing interactive educational materials. Below you’ll find the most important links and information about the application.

cookies.title: Information about local files and cookies
cookies.message: When you visit this site, local files and cookies are stored for the purposes of the site. The files are necessary for the operation of the site. These include:
cookies.not-accept: If you do not agree to the processing of cookies, please leave the site immediately.

not-found.title: Not Found
not-found.message:
The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.
You can also go back to the dashboard using the button below.

materials.not-found-by-criteria: No materials found with the given search criteria.

deletion.title: Confirm deletion
deletion.deletion: Are you really sure you want to delete this material? This action cannot be undone.
deletion.after: After clicking button "I am sure" the material will be deleted, including all of its slides, filled forms and other data.

import.title: Import material
import.description: Here you can import material from various file types. The application currently supports uploading a local backup (in JSON format) or a Markdown file created according to the guidelines.
import.error: The uploaded file does not match any supported format. Please check if you selected the correct file.

json.error: Invalid JSON file format. Please check if the file was created according to the guidelines.

md.error: Invalid Markdown file format. Please check if the file was created according to the guidelines.

saving.error: Problem while saving the material. Please try again later.

authentication.title: Login
about: Materalist is a modern platform for creating and sharing interactive educational materials, suitable not only for schools but also for professional environments. It allows you to create presentations, scripts, posters, quizzes, and other creative teaching formats — all in one clear and accessible interface.
To fully use the application, you need to create an account. With registration, you’ll be able to manage your materials, create new ones, and engage with the authoring community.
If you’re here just as a presentation participant (for example, a student or attendee), simply scan the QR code or open the link shared by the presenter. No registration is required.
Want to learn more about the application? Visit our homepage to explore examples, features, and reasons why you’ll love Materalist.

email.invalid: E-mail has to be in the correct format
email.label: E-mail

password.invalid: Password has to be at least 4 characters long
password.label: Password

fail.failed: Login failed. Make sure you entered correct account details.
fail.wrong-email: You entered wrong e-mail or there is already a request for login. Check your e-mail and try again.
fail.wrong-code: You entered wrong code. Check your e-mail and try again.

register.title: Registration

name.short: Name has to be at least 4 characters long
name.long: Name has to be at most 255 characters long
name.label: Name you want us to call you

email.invalid: E-mail has to be in the correct format
email.long: E-mail has to be at most 255 characters long
email.label: E-mail

password.short: Password has to be at least 8 characters long
password.long: Password has to be at most 255 characters long
password.label: Password

register.after-register: After registration, you will be asked to confirm your registration using the link in the entered e-mail.
register.by-registering: By registering you agree to terms of use and privacy policy.

success.title: Registration successful
success.message: Registration was successful. Check your e-mail for a link to confirm your registration. Then you can log in.

fail.failed: Registration failed. An account with this e-mail probably already exists. Try different e-mail.

activate.title: Account activation
activate.success: Account has been successfully activated. Now you can log in.
activate.fail: Account activation failed. Please try again later.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.not-found-by-criteria: No plugins found with the given search criteria.

name.label: Plugin Name
name.error: Plugin name must be filled in and have to be shorter than 255 characters.

description.label: Plugin Description
description.error: Plugin description must be filled in and have to be shorter than 255 characters.

name.label: Plugin Name
name.error: Plugin name must be filled in.

description.label: Plugin Description
description.error: Plugin description must be filled in.

new-release.title: Create New
new-release.help: In the following sections in the top navigation, fill in all the required information about the new plugin version. Once you are finished, click the 'Create New Version' button on the Overview and Submission page. Some errors in the form may only appear in the final step. For more information, visit the documentation.

version.label: Version code
version.error: The code must be filled in and have to be shorter than 255 characters.

manifest.label: Manifest
manifest.error: The manifest must be valid JSON.
manifest.length: The manifest has to be shorter than 32768 characters.
manifest.number: Manifest version must be filled in and must be a number.
manifest.allowedOrigins: Allowed domains must be an array containing only URL strings (only protocol and domain, without path).

changelog.label: Changes
changelog.error: Changes must be filled in and have to be shorter than 32768 characters.

editor.label: Editor code
editor.error: Editor code have to be shorter than 131072 characters.

player.label: Player code
player.error: Player code have to be shorter than 131072 characters.

summary.help: Submitting a new plugin version will immediately create a new version. This version will be recommended to all users of this plugin. Versions can only be deleted by contacting the support team. To submit, at least one code (editor or player) must be filled in.

user.title: Account Settings
user.name: New Name
user.error: Failed to change the details. Please check if you entered the correct password.

export.title: Export Personal Data
export.exported: Personal data has been exported. You can download it below until %date%. After that, the data will be deleted.
export.recent: The request has been recorded and the data is currently being exported. Once the data is ready, you will receive an email and will be able to download it here.
export.description: Here you can export the personal data we have about you. This data includes all your materials, plugins, and other information we have collected during your use of the application. The exported data will be in JSON format and will contain all the personal data we have about you.

featured.title: Featured Materials
featured.empty: No featured materials have been added yet.

new.title: Add Featured Material
new.description: Here you can mark one of your materials as featured. Featured materials will be shown on the homepage and will be accessible to all users. Only materials marked as public will be visible to others. Please use this feature responsibly and only share materials you truly want to make public.

remove.title: Remove Featured Material
remove.description: Removing a featured material will hide it from the homepage and make it unavailable to other users. However, the material will still be accessible to people who already have the link and if it is marked as public. Removal may take several hours to take effect.

variables.title: Material variables
variables.not-found: No variables found in this material.

error.localPluginAlreadyExists: Local plugin already exists. Reload the page to delete it.
error.noManifest: Missing manifest.json file in the ZIP archive.
error.noCode: The plugin must have at least one code file (editor.js or player.js).
error.zipError: Error while extracting the ZIP archive.

not-found.title: Not found
not-found.message: This material does not exist or you don't have access to it. Ask the owner to share it with you or check the URL.

share-link.title: Share Link
share-link.description: Share this link with others so they can view it independently at any time in the mode you set in the editor settings.

watch-link.title: Share Watch Link
watch-link.description: Share this link with others so they can join now and watch your progress through the material. This link is valid only for the current session and will no longer work once you leave the material.

failed.title: Failed to Start Watching
failed.description: The provided watch code is invalid. Please make sure you entered the correct code and try again. You will now be redirected to the material page where you can try to start watching again.

ended.title: Watching Ended
ended.description: The watching session has ended. You will now be redirected to the material page where you can either start watching again or go through the material on your own.

join.title: Join Watching
join.description: Enter the watch code provided by someone else to join and watch the material. This code is valid only for the current session and will no longer work once you leave the material.

notPublic.title: Material is Not Public
notPublic.description: This material is not public and therefore cannot be shared with anyone except the authors. If you want it to be public, go to the editor and change the visibility settings.

size.title: Size
size.width-invalid: Width has to be a number greater than 0
size.height-invalid: Height has to be a number greater than 0

export.title: Material export
export.description: Download an offline backup of your material in various formats. Exported files contain all slides but may be limited by the given format and all are without interactivity, for example.

exporting.title: Material is being exported
exporting.description: The material is being exported to the format. This operation may take several minutes. Once completed, the file will be automatically downloaded.

attendees.title: Co-authors
attendees.description: Add co-authors (attendees) to your material. They will be able to edit the material and present it to others. They cannot delete the material.

add.title: Add co-author
add.description: To add a co-author, enter their e-mail address. They will be able to see the material in their dashboard and edit it.

validation.filled: The value has to be filled
validation.number: The value has to be a number

KEEP_EDITOR_TO_FIT_PARENT.label: Keep editor to fit parent
KEEP_EDITOR_TO_FIT_PARENT.description: When enabled, the editor will always fit the parent element while resizing.

ROTATION_SNAPPING_COUNT.label: Rotation snapping count
ROTATION_SNAPPING_COUNT.description: The count of the snapping while rotating the object (using SHIFT while rotating).
ROTATION_SNAPPING_COUNT.range: The value should be between 2 and 180

PER_OBJECT_TRANSFORMATION.label: Per object transformation
PER_OBJECT_TRANSFORMATION.description: When enabled, the transformation (rotate and scale) will be applied per object instead of the selected objects (group).

AUTOMATIC_SAVING.label: Automatic saving
AUTOMATIC_SAVING.description: When enabled, the editor will automatically save the project regularly.

AUTOMATIC_SAVING_INTERVAL.label: Automatic saving interval
AUTOMATIC_SAVING_INTERVAL.description: The interval of the automatic saving. Is only available when the automatic saving is enabled.

HISTORY_LIMIT.label: History stack limit
HISTORY_LIMIT.description: The limit of the history stack. The editor will remove the oldest history if the limit is reached. May affect the performance.
HISTORY_LIMIT.range: The value should be between 5 and 1000

keybinds.title: Key bindings
keybinds.optional-key: This key is optional and pressing it may occur different outcome.

browse.title: Browse plugins
browse.no-plugins: No plugins found with the given search criteria.

activate.title: Activate plugin
activate.error: Failed to activate plugin. Please try again later.

manage.no-plugins: Current material has no active plugins. You can add some from the browse section.
manage.new-version: New version of the plugin is available. Remove the plugin and add it again to get the new version.

disabled.title: Not available plugins
disabled.description: Following plugins are not enabled or loaded in because they are not supported, they are not compatible with the current version of the manager or were removed from the application.

manage.old-version: This plugin is not supported thus it cannot be activated.

attention.title: Warning
attention.description: The plugin you are trying to add requires special permissions to access the editor. Please read the following plugin requirements carefully and if you agree, you can activate the plugin.
attention.allowed-origins: The plugin requires and will have access to call any actions from the following domains:

interactiveArea.name: Interactive area
interactiveArea.warning: This will not be visible in the player.

plugin.name: Plugin
plugin.failed: Failed to load content from plugin (%plugin%).
